title: What is your "Toxic Taunt"?

replies.body: http://i.imgur.com/kTWERoQ.jpg?noredirect
https://tse2.mm.bing.net/th?id=OIP.M972da59b96f7fa3ee116a629122437d7o0&pid=15.1
why does Sona have to have a huge rack and blushing at the same time just to hold a sign calling me bad when sona is FUCKING BROPKEN GG EZ PZ
Not my fault they overtuned my main.

Get a kill with {{champion:30}} ult

"Outplayed"
Words cannot express the joy this gives me.

{{champion:119}} you're not Draven!
http://ci.memecdn.com/345/9167345.jpg

When 3 people dive me, I zhonya's, and get a triple, all I say is a single word. This single word has been know to piss off every single living person alive, this word is what got the Leaning tower of Pisa to tilt, this word is possibly the most infuriating word barring yaaaas.





**_K_**
**Ok - {{champion:33}}

> [{quoted}](name=MavenSong,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6hNY5yAs,comment-id=00150000,timestamp=2016-07-24T01:02:31.572+0000)
>
> **Ok - {{champion:33}}

See? it's already working.

My toxic taunt is flashing mastery no matter what the reason is -
- Stole a minion? Mastery.
- Died? Mastery.
- Won a tiny trade? Mastery.
- Land a skill shot then dodge one? Mastery.
- Steal a minor camp from my jungler late game as they go to smite? Mastery.
- Level up? Mastery.
- Lay a pink ward? Mastery.
- Destroy a pink ward? Mastery.
- Flash in and die by accident? Mastery.
- Lagging and can't control my champion? Mastery.
- Uninstall? Mastery.

Gets a kill with a {{champion:99}} laser or a {{champion:202}} W.

"Wait, I got a KILL?!? I wasn't aiming at all!"
Cry me a river, build a bridge, and get over it.
yesterday my friend was playing full AD jarvan and after he oneshot his lane opponent I was tempted to ask in all chat 'Show me on the doll where the jarvan touched you'

Kill someone as {{champion:75}} and spam his taunt while flashing mastery

Tilts the fuck out of people xD

Whenever I survive a fight with around 1 hp

"Calculated"

Also spamming mastery is still god-tier insulting. Especially if it's mastery level 4.

> [{quoted}](name=Celestial Bodied,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6hNY5yAs,comment-id=0027,timestamp=2016-07-24T07:57:28.083+0000)
>
> Whenever I survive a fight with around 1 hp
> 
> "Calculated"
> 
> Also spamming mastery is still god-tier insulting. Especially if it's mastery level 4.

Even funnier than that, is after getting a good teamfight or a solo kill, asking in all chat, "hey how do you do that thing over your head? When do you unlock that?" Or some other feigned ignorance. People just *cannot handle* losing to people "still learning the game."
My way of taunting only takes one keystroke. After someone makes a bad play i hit them with a "?", that's it.
"You almost did something, emphasis on almost".
Just spam Nami laugh.
{{champion:4}}  death by papercuts

Step 1: Find out what your opponent is best at.

Step 2: Compliment them on their improvement on that exact thing.

They always think, "What do you mean I'm getting better at that, that's not the thing I'm improving in!" And they go full tilt instantly.

The most annoying thing is playing with an aram {{champion:96}}  and having him spam his gurgly song thing over and over again... My friend did it for 5 solid mins just to annoy our team.

DUNGA DUNGA DUNGA DUNGA DUN DUN DUN DA DUN
NEED MORE DAKKA. When adc can't kill me.
You called?
...yes
To avoid the use of bad words but still delivering I often use "Bull Fertilizer"
When the jungler ganks me, but him and the enemy laner are half health and I get a double, I find a simple "nah" gets the job done, even better if I walk out and ignite brings me to 100>
{{champion:26}}  (when I kill someone with Bloodmoon Zilean's auto-attack) cause of death: red auto thingy
The classical Recall BM when they are dying from ignite/deathfire touch/minions, that or mastery emote :P
Ez git gud not even close or mastery emote

To my team:
"Rengar is getting angry... HARVEST HIM FOR HIS SALT"

To the enemy team:
"Have you see my bear Tibbers?"
Ctrl + 6
I believe it's hot-keyed to press the " CTRL " key and the " 2 " key at the same time.

When they do something stupid. 

'Thank you for the gold, if you want to deposit more you're welcome.'

"What was your plan?"

Whenever they do a stupid death.

{{champion:89}}. "Next time... try to leave a dent"

I also like " there is no need to be upset"

After the enemy jungle ganks my ADC and runs screaming with hammer imprints in their behind, only one phrase brings me true satisfaction.

**_Erm, how about no?_**

#SupportPoppyLyfe

seems people always want to report me after i say.

"you are doing nothing with the cs.. go find another lane."
I mean I would. making a joke is one thing but calling someone bad is another.

{{champion:41}} (Snipes Kill with Ult from the other side of the map)

YaRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR

R+ctrl 6. Aand

Azir: I AM ACSENDANT!

Yasuo: SOYRE GE TON!

NO hate plz I do it for style.

Usually I just respond with my rank emote if someone uses it near me.

I really love when I'm on a rank 4 champion and they're on a 6-7 during those times.  Such sweet victory.

Just type FeelsGoodMan after every kill and death and assist. Doesn't even matter if you were a part of it.
Works 100% of the time
"Dunk'd"

As {{champion:3}} when someone ganks and I 1 v 2 them.

**"You should come back with more bad guys."**

_It's his taunt_

When I one shot someone as Kat who is really saltly or thinks they are good 

"Bye"

{{champion:432}} *Mastery 6 Emote*

I tilted a Mastery 7 Karma using it.
